job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Skills Required:
• Medical device or any regulatory industry company experience required
• Degree in computer science or software engineering or electrical engineering
• 5-10+ years’ experience in software development within Linux OS with the help of C/C++.
• Scripting in python is good to have.
• Translating software requirements into software design experience.
• Someone who understands threading and processes in Linux, real time operating systems, UML, software architecture, ITC (interface protocol), write API
• Cyber security private or public keys or encryption is a plus
• IEC 62304 or ISO 14971 risk regulations is a plus
• Soft skills: work well in a team environment under agile methodology
